meanings.definition: To spray or squirt a small amount of liquid
meanings.sent1: She spritzes water on the plants every morning.
meanings.sent2: He spritzes his cologne before going out.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat spritzes water at the dog to play.
meanings.sent4: The chef spritzes lemon juice onto the dish like an artist.
meanings.sent5: The gardener spritzes fertilizer to help the flowers grow.

meanings.definition: A quick squirt or spray of liquid
meanings.sent1: She felt a refreshing spritzes of water on her face.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the cool spritzes of mist from the fan.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they received spritzes from the water gun.
meanings.sent4: The sudden spritzes of rain caught them by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The spa offers a relaxing facial spritzes for their clients.
